citation.author: Author:
citation.creator: Creator:
citation.formatExplanation: The Elements for a Bibliographic Reference information above provides the specific elements described by Schema.org, Datacite and Research Data Australia/ARDC. Datacite also includes optional elements such as Publisher and Format. The Identifier provided by PARADISEC is the DOI, PARADISEC Catalogue Item URL, or the URI. You may need to use different information depending on the citation format you are using.
citation.title: Citation
citation.tooltip: Bibliographic elements to construct a citation for the current item.
